GSD.description:
video: fbdev: nvidiafb: Use strscpy() to prevent buffer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 72dd5c46a152136712a55bf026a9aa8c1b12b60d. For more details please see the references link.
